events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but would like to request a refund because it does not fit properly and I am not satisfied with it.
Tagging this case under Refund as the customer is requesting a return and money back due to dissatisfaction with the product fit.
Assigning this support case to the returns specialist team for further handling of the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you would like to request a refund for your jacket. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging for us to proceed?
My order number is 789456123. The jacket is brand new, I have not worn it, and the packaging is intact as when I received it.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process once you ship the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will send you.
That sounds good to me. Please send the return label at your earliest convenience so I can send the jacket back.
We have emailed you the prepaid return shipping label. Once we receive the jacket, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that your jacket return was received and your refund has been processed successfully.
Since your refund has been completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
